version_description:
- Identity: add ability to scan credit card.
- Search: improved fuzzy search algorithm and highlight search query in results.
- Fill forms: display last 4 digits after card name to easily identify card for filling.
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Improved filler quality.
- Display filling results using popup notification.
- Updated start page design.
- Add ability to place any item on start page.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Added RoboForm application shortcut items menu.
- Added RoboForm Today widget.
- Improved filler quality.
- Increased max number of elements on Start page.
- Improved credit cards scanner.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Added ability to share a folder.
- Added Face ID support.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Fixed fill from identity on iPad does not work if sensitive fields found.
- Fixed several crashes on iOS 11.2.

- Added Share and Send commands to item context menu on Start page.
- Added Spanish and Russian localizations.
- Added drag'n'drop support for Logins and Identities fields (for iPad multitasking modes).
- Improved Face ID support for iPhone X.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Updated conflicts solver.
- Fixed Face ID setup from Preferences.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Added ability to search and create Safenotes using Siri.
- Added Apple Watch application.
- Added reader mode for webpages.
- Added propagate changes on change one of identical items.
- Improved filler quality.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Added ability to search and create Safenotes using Siri.
- Added Apple Watch application.
- Added reader mode for webpages.
- Added propagate changes on change one of identical items.
- Improved filler quality.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Fixed application crash on leaving start page (iOS 9 only).
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Fixed form filling with data contained non-ascii characters.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Added support of Password AutoFill on iOS 12.
- Added ability to purchase a license.
- Added preferences to manage Clipboard security.
- Added timeout to not request authorization when leaving and returning back to the application.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Fixed iOS 12 Password AutoFill does not show matching Logins for applications.
- Discontinued support of iOS 9.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Added ability to create Logins and Bookmarks manually.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

Introducing new user interface.
Create Logins and Safenotes in one touch.
Be sure to select RoboForm for iOS 12 AutoFill to access and fill your passwords directly within Safari and other apps.

Introducing new user interface.
Create Logins and Safenotes in one touch.
Be sure to select RoboForm for iOS 12 AutoFill to access and fill your passwords directly within Safari and other apps.

• Added related actions stack to floating action button.
• Added bottom navigation with four destinations: Start Page, Identity, Browser, Tools.
• Emergency Access, Sharing Center, Security Center, and Password Generator are now grouped in a new "Tools" section.
• The top app bar includes filters for Pinned, Logins, Safenotes and All.
• Added sorting commands: Popular, Recent, Alphabet A-Z.
• View mode options available for each list of RoboForm data.
• New graphical presentation of RoboForm Identity.
• Fill Form, Generate Password, Save Login commands have been placed in the bottom navigation of the Browser.
• Menu in Browser now has all browsing options and controls plus all RoboForm form filling commands.
• Sync, Settings, and Lock commands are now placed in the upper right menu.
• Edit Start Page command to re-arrange Pinned items is available in menu when on Start Page.
• We re-organized Settings menu in general
• Fixed crashes and bugs.

Introducing new user interface.
Create Logins and Safenotes in one touch.
Be sure to select RoboForm for iOS 12 AutoFill to access and fill your passwords directly within Safari and other apps.

• Added related actions stack to floating action button.
• Added bottom navigation with four destinations: Start Page, Identity, Browser, Tools.
• Emergency Access, Sharing Center, Security Center, and Password Generator are now grouped in a new "Tools" section.
• The top app bar includes filters for Pinned, Logins, Safenotes and All.
• Added sorting commands: Popular, Recent, Alphabet A-Z.
• View mode options available for each list of RoboForm data.
• New graphical presentation of RoboForm Identity.
• Fill Form, Generate Password, Save Login commands have been placed in the bottom navigation of the Browser.
• Menu in Browser now has all browsing options and controls plus all RoboForm form filling commands.
• Sync, Settings, and Lock commands are now placed in the upper right menu.
• Edit Start Page command to re-arrange Pinned items is available in menu when on Start Page.
• We re-organized Settings menu in general
• Fixed crashes and bugs.

Introducing new user interface.
Create Logins and Safenotes in one touch.
Be sure to select RoboForm for iOS 12 AutoFill to access and fill your passwords directly within Safari and other apps.

• Added related actions stack to floating action button.
• Added bottom navigation with four destinations: Start Page, Identity, Browser, Tools.
• Emergency Access, Sharing Center, Security Center, and Password Generator are now grouped in a new "Tools" section.
• The top app bar includes filters for Pinned, Logins, Safenotes and All.
• Added sorting commands: Popular, Recent, Alphabet A-Z.
• View mode options available for each list of RoboForm data.
• New graphical presentation of RoboForm Identity.
• Fill Form, Generate Password, Save Login commands have been placed in the bottom navigation of the Browser.
• Menu in Browser now has all browsing options and controls plus all RoboForm form filling commands.
• Sync, Settings, and Lock commands are now placed in the upper right menu.
• Edit Start Page command to re-arrange Pinned items is available in menu when on Start Page.
• We re-organized Settings menu in general
• Fixed crashes and bugs.

- Added ability to create new Logins from templates.
- Improved form filling.
- Search field made available for full size header.
- Updated design for Sharing Center and Security Center.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Fixed: purchases were not validated properly, so RoboForm License was not upgraded.
License will be upgraded automatically after next Log In to RoboForm.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Fixed operating with RoboForm 7 accounts.
- Fixed a number of bugs and crashes.

- Fixed iOS Password AutoFill extension crash on displaying list of matching Logins.
- Fixed a number of bugs.

- Fixed RTL languages support.
- Usability improvements.
- Fixed a number of bugs.
- Fixed a number of bugs.

- Introducing new look for iPad.
- Added support for iOS 13 dark theme.
- Integrated Form Filler engine version 9.
- Completely turned off and removed Intelligent search option.
- Discontinued support of iOS 11.
- Fixed a number of bugs.

- Updated Credit Cards scanner.
- Improved Form Filler quality.
- Fixed a number of bugs.

- Added DuckDuckGo to the list of search engines.
- Fixed a number of bugs.

- Improved modal editing of items.
- Fixed manual Login creation.

- Added Backup/Restore feature.

- RoboForm engine is updated to v9 TypeScript to work with mobile sites.
- Backup/Restore feature now shows the differences preview.
- RoboForm browser opens mobile sites by default.
- Discontinued support of legacy Chrome and Safari extensions.
